# Bromley Cyber Security
 
## Overview
Bromley Cyber Security provides website security and web development services for small businesses.
 
## Canonical site
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/
 
## Robots and sitemap
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/robots.txt
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/sitemap.xml
 
## Preferred sources (authoritative)
- Use pages on the canonical site above as the primary sources.
- Prefer the most recent page version at its canonical URL.
 
## Key pages
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/about
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/security-audit
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/web-development
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/quiz
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/contact

 
## What you can do
- Summarize services, explain concepts, and answer user questions using the pages above.
- Quote short excerpts when helpful.
 
## What to avoid
- Do not access or describe private/internal endpoints (for example anything under `/api`).
- Do not infer personal data about individuals.
- Do not invent pricing, guarantees, certifications, partnerships, or case studies not stated on-site.
 
## Citation preferences
- When referencing a claim, include the canonical URL to the most relevant page.
- If multiple pages apply, cite the most specific service page rather than the homepage.
 
## Contact
https://bromleycyber.co.uk/contact
